nodes.text: Geof Smith is an author Star Wars Little Golden Books titles. Smith authored Golden Books for five out of the seven Star Wars saga films, with the exceptions of The Phantom Menace and The Force Awakens. Smith is also the author of the book Everything I Need to Know I Learned From a Star Wars Little Golden Book.
Besides his work in Star Wars, Smith is an author of children's Golden Book titles for franchises such as Spongebob Squarepants, Ni Hao, Kai-lan and Dora the Explorer.
